results.title: Atlantic parks = Parcs Atlantique
results.creator_credit: Andre Belleau, Jacques Bobet and ONF | NFB
results.brief_description: An exploration of three of Canada’s National Parks; Fundy, Prince Edward Island and Cape Breton Highlands, all on the Atlantic coast, where, by filmmaker’s licence’ boy meets girl, marries and has a family, all while enjoying the park’s many other rewards for autocampers. Even the girl’s little white car, which leads us to the parks at the outset, seems to run on the pure air and the anticipation of fresh adventures around the next turn.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Andre Belleau, Jacques Bobet and ONF | NFB

results.title: Atlantic link
results.creator_credit: Jack Greenwood and Film Producers Guild
results.brief_description: This film traces the laying of the first transatlantic submarine telephone cable, made possible by the cooperation of technologists and engineers in the United Kingdom, the United States and Canada. Describes the routing of landlines on both sides of the Atlantic; the drama and precision involved in the laying of cables between Britain and Newfoundland.
results.description: This film traces the laying of the first transatlantic submarine telephone cable, made possible by the cooperation of technologists and engineers in the United Kingdom, the United States and Canada. Describes the routing of landlines on both sides of the Atlantic; the drama and precision involved in the laying of cables between Britain and Newfoundland.

results.title: Atlantic Isles
results.brief_description: Compares the life of people in the Shetland Isles, where the climate is extreme, with that of the people of the Channel Isles who enjoy more equable weather. Shetland Isles (Mainland, Unst, Yell, Foula, Lerwick): crofter’s house, vegetable growing, Shetland ponies, weaving, knitting fair-isle woollens, fishing. Channel Isles (Alderney, Guernsey, Sark, Jersey, St Peter Port, St Hellier): tomato growing in glasshouses, potato growing, cattle breeding, historic buildings.

results.title: Atlantic community: introducing Portugal
results.creator_credit: North Atlantic Treaty Organization and Europa Telefilm
results.brief_description: Describes the country and the people of Portugal - geographical features, historical development and achievements, economic life, occupations of the people, and social customs. Explains briefly the role of Portugal in the North Atlantic Treaty Organisation. Narrated by Robert Beatty.

results.title: Atlantic City USA
results.creator_credit: Louis Malle, Denis Heroux, Selta Films and Cine-Neighbour
results.brief_description: The legalisation of gambling in Atlantic City brings about big changes in the life of an aging, smalltime numbers runner, especially when he meets up with a beautiful younger woman who entangles him with the Mob. Starring Burt Lancaster and Susan Sarandon.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Louis Malle, Denis Heroux, Selta Films and Cine-Neighbour

results.title: Athletics: the triple jump
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Sports training film series”.
Performances by international athletes Frank Attoh, Nat Augustin, Barbara Clarke, Reynold Edwards, Kim Hagger, Colin Mitchell and Daley Thompson are used to demonstrate and analyse the basic techniques of the triple jump. Narrated by Ron Pickering.

results.title: Athletics: the sprint
results.creator_credit: Colin Moffat, Elizabeth Isaacs, Guardian Royal Exchange Assurance and Dan Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Sports training film series”.
One of a series of athletics training films. Looks at the sprinter with particular emphasis given to the development of running skills and starting from the blocks. Narrated by Ron Pickering.

results.title: Athletics: the long jump
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Sports training film series”.
Daley Thompson, Britain’s greatest ever all round athlete, shows a variety of jumping, hopping and bounding activities that condition the jumper.

results.title: Athletics: hurdles
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Sports training film series”.
Looks at high hurdling and 400 metre hurdles and shows, at normal speed and in slow motion, the basic actions of hurdling as demonstrated in relay matches between Oxford and Cambridge. Narrated by Ron Pickering.
results.description:
Episode of Series “Sports training film series”.
Looks at high hurdling and 400 metre hurdles and shows, at normal speed and in slow motion, the basic actions of hurdling as demonstrated in relay matches between Oxford and Cambridge. Narrated by Ron Pickering.
description_for_label:
Episode of Series “Sports training film series”.
Looks at high hurdling and 400 metre hurdles and shows, at normal speed and in slow motion, the basic actions of hurdling as demonstrated in relay matches between Oxford and Cambridge. Narrated by Ron Pickering.
